mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE USERNAME IN ( SELECT userName FROM MEMBER WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, lastTime, now()) >= 3)
UPDATE MEMBER SET LASTTIME=now() WHERE USERNAME=#{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USERNAME,PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, ENABLED) VALUES(#{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{enabled})
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{userName}

SELECT M.userName, M.email, R.num, R.ROLENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON M.USERNAME = MR.USERNAME INNER JOIN ROLE R ON MR.NUM = R.NUM WHERE M.USERNAME=#{userName} AND M.PASSWORD=#{password}
